A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie threw OT logic and lore into the fireplace in favor of appealing to children.  The main characters are as deep as the water in one's bathtub.  The 2 + hour movie served no purpose other than destroy the OT and milk a franchise already empty.  It does not move along the new trilogy or add to the original 6 movies.  One can skip over VIII and not miss a beat from VII to IX.  I can go on for days concerning almost every scene and \"plot\" issue\, but I do not want to post  \"spoilers.\" However\, I eill say the opening sequence makes zero sense with any of the knowledge of the Star Wars Universe and lore.
